00045 #include "Posture.h"
00046 
00047 Posture::Posture(unsigned int ID, unsigned int num)
00048   : numNodes(num)
00049   , postureID(ID)
00050   , nodePs(NULL)
00051   , posture_name()
00052   , alphaMean(NULL)
00053   , alphaSD(NULL)
00054   , nodeRadius(NULL)
00055   , nodeSpeed(NULL)
00056   , postureMaxSpeed(0)
00057   , postureMinSpeed(0)
00058 {
00059   posture_name[0] = 0;
00060   nodePs          = new Coord[numNodes];
00061   nodeRadius      = new double[numNodes];
00062   nodeSpeed       = new double[numNodes];
00063 
00064   alphaMean = new double*[numNodes];
00065   for (unsigned int i=0;i<numNodes;++i)
00066     alphaMean[i] = new double[numNodes];
00067 
00068   alphaSD = new double*[numNodes];
00069   for (unsigned int i=0;i<numNodes;++i)
00070     alphaSD[i] = new double[numNodes];
00071 }
00072 
00073 Posture::Posture(const Posture& o)
00074   : numNodes(o.numNodes)
00075   , postureID(o.postureID)
00076   , nodePs(NULL)
00077   , posture_name()
00078   , alphaMean(NULL)
00079   , alphaSD(NULL)
00080   , nodeRadius(NULL)
00081   , nodeSpeed(NULL)
00082   , postureMaxSpeed(o.postureMaxSpeed)
00083   , postureMinSpeed(o.postureMinSpeed)
00084 {
00085   strcpy(posture_name, o.posture_name);
00086   nodePs     = new Coord[numNodes];
00087   nodeRadius = new double[numNodes];
00088   nodeSpeed  = new double[numNodes];
00089 
00090   for (unsigned j=0; j < numNodes; ++j) {
00091     nodePs[j]     = o.nodePs[j];
00092     nodeRadius[j] = o.nodeRadius[j];
00093     nodeSpeed[j]  = o.nodeSpeed[j];
00094   }
00095 
00096   alphaMean = new double*[numNodes];
00097   alphaSD   = new double*[numNodes];
00098   for (unsigned int i=0;i<numNodes;++i) {
00099     alphaMean[i] = new double[numNodes];
00100     alphaSD[i]   = new double[numNodes];
00101     for (unsigned j=0; j < numNodes; ++j) {
00102       alphaMean[i][j] = o.alphaMean[i][j];
00103       alphaSD[i][j]   = o.alphaSD[i][j];
00104     }
00105   }
00106 }
00107 
00108 Posture& Posture::operator=(const Posture& copy)
00109 {
00110   Posture tmp(copy);
00111   swap(tmp);
00112   return *this;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void Posture::swap(Posture& o)
00116 {
00117   std::swap(numNodes,        o.numNodes);
00118   std::swap(postureID,       o.postureID);
00119   std::swap(nodePs,          o.nodePs);
00120   memcpy(posture_name, o.posture_name, sizeof(posture_name));
00121   std::swap(alphaMean,       o.alphaMean);
00122   std::swap(alphaSD,         o.alphaSD);
00123   std::swap(nodeRadius,      o.nodeRadius);
00124   std::swap(nodeSpeed,       o.nodeSpeed);
00125   std::swap(postureMaxSpeed, o.postureMaxSpeed);
00126   std::swap(postureMinSpeed, o.postureMinSpeed);
00127 }
00128 
00129 Posture::~Posture()
00130 {
00131   delete[] nodePs;
00132   delete[] nodeRadius;
00133   delete[] nodeSpeed;
00134 
00135   for (unsigned int i=0;i<numNodes;++i) {
00136     delete[] alphaMean[i];
00137     delete[] alphaSD[i];
00138   }
00139   delete[] alphaMean;
00140   delete[] alphaSD;
00141 }
00142 
00143 bool Posture::setPs(unsigned int i , Coord ps)
00144 {
00145   if (i<numNodes){
00146     nodePs[i] = ps;
00147     return true;
00148   }
00149   return false;
00150 }
00151 
00152 bool Posture::setPostureName(const char *str)
00153 {
00154   strncpy(posture_name, str, sizeof(posture_name)/sizeof(posture_name[0]));
00155   return true;
00156 }

00158 
00159 bool Posture::setAlphaMean(unsigned int i, unsigned int j, double alpha_mean)
00160 {
00161   if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes){
00162     alphaMean[i][j] = alpha_mean;
00163     return true;
00164   }
00165   return false;
00166 }
00167 
00168 bool Posture::setAlphaSD(unsigned int i, unsigned int j, double alpha_sd)
00169 {
00170   if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes){
00171     alphaSD[i][j] = alpha_sd;
00172     return true;
00173   }
00174   return false;
00175 }
00176 
00177 bool Posture::setRadius(unsigned int i, double radius)
00178 {
00179   if (i<numNodes){
00180     nodeRadius[i] = radius;
00181     return true;
00182   }
00183   return false;
00184 }
00185 
00186 bool Posture::setSpeed(unsigned int i , double speed)
00187 {
00188   if (i<numNodes){
00189     nodeSpeed[i] = speed;
00190     return true;
00191   }
00192   return false;
00193 }
00194 
00195 bool Posture::setPostureSpeed(double min, double max)
00196 {
00197   if (max < min)
00198     return false;
00199 
00200   postureMaxSpeed = max;
00201   postureMinSpeed = min;
00202   return true;
00203 }
00204 
00205 Coord  Posture::getPs(unsigned int i) const
00206 {
00207   if (i<numNodes)
00208     return nodePs[i];
00209 
00210   return Coord(-1,-1,-1);
00211 }
00212 
00213 double Posture::getAlphaMean(unsigned int i, unsigned int j) const
00214 {
00215   if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes)
00216     return alphaMean[i][j];
00217 
00218   return -1;
00219 }
00220 
00221 double Posture::getAlphaSD(unsigned int i, unsigned int j) const
00222 {
00223   if (i<numNodes && j<numNodes)
00224     return alphaSD[i][j];
00225 
00226   return -1;
00227 }
00228 
00229 double Posture::getRadius(unsigned int i) const
00230 {
00231   if (i<numNodes)
00232     return nodeRadius[i];
00233 
00234   return -1;
00235 }
00236 
00237 double Posture::getSpeed(unsigned int i) const
00238 {
00239   if (i<numNodes)
00240     return nodeSpeed[i];
00241 
00242   return -1;
00243 }

00245 const char* Posture::getPostureName() const
00246 {
00247   return posture_name;
00248 }
00249 
00250 int Posture::getPostureID() const
00251 {
00252   return postureID;

00255 double Posture::getMaxSpeed() const
00256 {
00257   return postureMaxSpeed;

00259 
00260 double Posture::getMinSpeed() const
00261 {
00262   return postureMinSpeed;
00263 }
00264 
00265 bool Posture::isMobile() const
00266 {
00267   return postureMaxSpeed > 0;
00268 }
